root.name: Survival Kids 2
root.description: OverviewSurvival Kids 2: Dasshutsu!! Futago Shima! was released for the Gameboy Color by Konami on July 19, 2000 in Japan. The game was the second entry in the Survival Kids series and the last to be released for the Gameboy Color. Survival Kids 2 features nearly identical gameplay to its predecessor with the addition of link cable support and a streamlined interface for combining items.Despite positive impressions from the Japanese release, the game was never localized for other territories.
